title: Check-in + Breakfast
desc: Badge pickup, breakfast, and seating. Get ready for kickoff.

title: Opening Ceremony
desc: Welcome, theme overview, rules, judging criteria, and sponsor intros.

title: Mentor Hours Begin
desc: Get feedback on problem framing, architecture, and demo plan.

title: Workshop: Rapid Prototyping
desc: Build an MVP quickly; prioritize features and scope.

title: Dinner
desc: Dinner served; refuel and keep building.

title: Devpost Submission Deadline
desc: Submit project page, repo links, and demo video if required.

title: Final Review + Prep
desc: Polish demo, finalize slides, and rehearse pitch.

title: Winners Announced
desc: Awards, closing remarks, and group photo.

title: Closing Ceremony
desc: Wrap-up, next steps, and community announcements.
